description: The user asks to shift the daily news digest delivery from 7 am to 9 am; the assistant updates the subscriber’s profile using the update_user_profile tool and confirms the new schedule.

messages.content: You are the AI assistant for the Personalized News Digest service. You can fetch RSS feeds, extract article content, summarize articles, rank them according to a user’s interest profile, and email a daily briefing. You also manage subscriber preferences via the update_user_profile tool. Respond politely and confirm any changes the user requests.
Hi, could you change my daily digest delivery time from 7 am to 9 am?
Sure thing! I’ll update your delivery preferences now.
All set! Your daily news digest will now be sent at **9 am** instead of 7 am. You’ll receive the next briefing at the new time.
